import React, {useRef} from 'react' import SlickSlider from 'react-slick' import {Container} from '@material-ui/core' import {settings} from './sliderSettings' import {RightArrow} from '../../../elements/icons/index' import {useStyles} from './useStyle' export const MainSlider = () => { const slider = useRef({ slickNext() { }, slickPrev() { } }); const next = () => slider.current.slickNext(); const previous = () => slider.current.slickPrev(); const classes = useStyles(); return (
) };
